description:
I was tasked to create a full-stack website for the Biomedical Devices and Technology Department under the Department of Science and Technology along with other 2 members.

Apart from this, I had to develop an admin component to display the data accumulated from various resources for research to the admin in a presentable form. This was the most challenging part as I had to display more than 10k records in an efficient and appealing form.

This experience taught me a great deal about designing and developing efficient user interfaces and the importance of considering user experience in my work.

Overall, my work has been focused on leveraging my technical skills to build intuitive and efficient web applications that provide value to the end-users.

techStack: React, Node, Express, MongoDB, Socket.io, AWS
description:
As a full-stack developer, I have had the opportunity to work on several exciting projects, including developing two web applications using the MERN stack that were deployed on AWS.

The first web application I developed was an admin portal for managing devices, creating users, allocating devices, and much more. This website was designed to streamline device management and enable administrators to perform various device-related tasks quickly and efficiently.

The second website I developed was a client-end website that allowed users to monitor the data collected by devices and view various analyses calculated in graphical form. This website was designed to be user-friendly and intuitive, allowing users to configure devices and receive real-time updates from them.

Throughout these projects, I leveraged my technical skills to build efficient and intuitive web applications that provided value to the end-users. I am excited about continuing to grow my skills as a web developer and taking on new challenges in this field.

techStack: C++, Competitive Programming, Data Structures, Algorithms
description: As a mentor at TLE Eliminators, my role entailed guiding and supporting students in their competitive programming endeavors, fostering their growth by addressing their queries and concerns. I actively engaged in assisting students in their learning process, enabling them to develop their skills, gain insights from their errors, grasp new concepts, and enhance their overall knowledge.

I played an active role in elevating customer satisfaction and increasing employee productivity by implementing state-of-the-art technologies. Additionally, I worked on overhauling the customer help center portal, making it more user-friendly and thus, effective in resolving customer issues.

techStack: React, dotnet framework, dotnet core, C#, Mongo, SQL
description: I was part of the team that developed a machine learning model to predict user behavior and preferences, enabling the company to tailor its services to individual users. I also worked on optimizing the model's performance and scalability, ensuring that it could handle large volumes of data efficiently.
I'm a part of the CB-GPT Team, working on enterprise level LLM solutions for the company.
